alert.note: Alert for Graham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 1:27PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GRAHAM COUNTY THROUGH 200 PM EDT... At 127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Robbinsville, or near Town Of Santeetlah, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Robbinsville, Town Of Santeetlah, Fontana Village, Lake Santeetlah, Fontana Lake, Stecoah, Cheoah, Tapoco, and Nantahala. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
